title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1728/2002 of 27 September 2002 amending Regulation (EC) No 1706/2002 fixing the export refunds in the milk and milk products sector
header:
Commission Regulation (EC) No 1728/2002
of 27 September 2002
amending Regulation (EC) No 1706/2002 fixing the export refunds in the milk and milk products sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1255/1999 of 17 May 1999 on the common organization of the market in milk and milk products(1), as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 509/2002(2), and in particular Article 31(3) thereof,
Whereas:
Commission Regulation (EC) No 1706/2002(3) sets export refunds on products in the milk and milk products sector. A check has shown that its Annex is not consistent with the measures presented for an opinion to the management committee; therefore, the Regulation should be corrected,
main_body:
In the Annex to Regulation (EC) No 1706/2002, the amount of refund for product code 0402 29 15 93/00 is replaced by the following:
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on 28 September 2002.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 September 2002.
For the Commission
Franz Fischler
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 160, 26.6.1999, p. 48.
(2) OJ L 79, 22.3.2002, p. 15.
(3) OJ L 259, 27.9.2002, p. 36.
